name: dee-en-eh-data-vault-lambda
description: Lambda functions for Dee-en-eh Data Vault

scripts.build:creds: mkdir -p dist && rm -rf node_modules && npm install --production && zip -r dist/get-aws-credentials.zip get-aws-credentials.js node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.build:auth: mkdir -p dist && rm -rf node_modules && npm install google-auth-library --production && zip -r dist/google-jwt-authorizer.zip google-jwt-authorizer.js node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.build: npm run build:creds && npm run build:auth
